content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or emotions, but I can provide some information on the popular types of architecture in Vlorë.

Some of the most popular types of architecture in Vlorë include Ottoman-era buildings, which are characterized by their use of arches, domes, and colonnades, and neoclassical styles, introduced by the Italians in the early 20th century. Other popular styles in Vlorë include Art Nouveau, which features decorative elements inspired by natural forms, and modernist architecture, which prioritizes function over form and often incorporates materials like concrete and steel.

Some notable buildings in Vlorë include the Independence Monument, a neoclassical-style monument erected in 1932 to commemorate Albania's independence from the Ottoman Empire, and the Mosque of Muradie, an Ottoman-era mosque built in the 16th century. Both of these buildings are significant landmarks in the city and showcase different architectural styles.
